The Quranic researcher said it is his soul: and the same thing, and what has been settled, that is: it was established and created, preparing for its fullness; This is by the elimination of its members and its phenomenon and the interior, and the denial of the multiplication, and it was said: to disturb the person who is intended for the soul of the soul of the soul and the soul of the Prophet and the first of the Prophet, and the first of the Prophet is upon him The following division, and whoever goes to that made it from the use.Farah, djajaj, and murdered, gave and others, and others, that "what" is in the three positions.That is: (P-143), its construction, its mill, and its level.Al -Zamakhshari followed him that he is not in the face of his saying: He is an inspiration for her and her immorality, and what he leads to the corruption of the arrogance; That is on what is in the footnotes, because of the necessity of the verb at the name, and that he does not have an actor, not an apparent, and he is an apparent and no guaranteed for the boundary of his return.It was assumed that the last is contrary to the preceding acts; It means "her son, her flour, her will" that the connotation of confrontation is sufficient in the validity of the guarantee, and as for the first, he is in it that the kindness of the verb is on the name of the name, and it is not the same.It is after "what" as if it was said: the soul and its level, its barbecue, its debts and its eagerness.It was assumed that the fulfillment indicates the installation from otherwise, and the level before the breath of the spirit and the gossip after the mangain The thinking and the emancipation is a expressive of the exaggeration of its use in this solution, and it is not a difference from it since my level.It is based on the fact that the lease is in its nose, and it may be considered to be punished without being chronicled, and then it is the bought of commitment and there is no meaning to the saying of the good one: The agreement of the readers, so it is not permissible, and its soul, and its inspiration, may God protect it; It is a fortress, but that is based on the delusion that his saying is up to the Almighty: so he inspired it as a sentence, and in the sentence does not clarify the corruption of this face.And the judge, Abd al -Jabar, is only the source without the Mosuliya, he said: Because it is necessary from it, the bodies of the sections, without God, are obligated to the sections of his sections.And the imam replied that the greatest of the suns of the sun, so God mentioned it with the four descriptions of the four indicative of its greatness, then he mentioned the sake With three attributes, the mind has the realization of the majesty of God, and his greatness was glorified, as it is appropriate for him to the majesty of his majesty, and he will not be removed from the sense of the sense of the sense of the sense of the sense of
